This process requires:
1.Your device is connected to your WIFI network
2.A Registered and Active Account
3.With the current account bound
Add completed \n Go to List View device status
The device needs to be rebound to update software.
Suggest using 5V/ 1A charger, \nState light is solid green while charging and it will be off when charge done.
Status indicator light should be red constantly, if not, pls restart device,then hold wifi button 3 seconds and wait the light turn red.
